.. index:: FiniteFieldNormalBasis

.. _l46696e6974654669656c644e6f726d616c4261736973:

FiniteFieldNormalBasis(p, extdeg)
=================================

:viewcode:`ffdoms.spad line 2745 <ffdoms.spad#L2745>` :editcode:`[edit on github] <ffdoms.spad#L2745>`

* p: \ :ref:`PositiveInteger <l506f736974697665496e7465676572>`\ 

* extdeg: \ :ref:`PositiveInteger <l506f736974697665496e7465676572>`\ 


FiniteFieldNormalBasis(\ ``p``\ , \ ``n``\ ) implements a finite extension field of degree \ ``n``\  over the prime field with \ ``p``\  elements. The elements are represented by coordinate vectors with respect to a normal basis, i.e. a basis consisting of the conjugates (\ ``q``\ -powers) of an element, in this case called normal element. This is chosen as a root of the extension polynomial created by \ :ref:`createNormalPoly <l46696e6974654669656c64506f6c796e6f6d69616c5061636b616765-6372656174654e6f726d616c506f6c79>`\ .


.. _l46696e6974654669656c644e6f726d616c4261736973-30:

\ :ref:`0 <l4162656c69616e4d6f6e6f6964-30>`\ \: % 
  from \ :ref:`AbelianMonoid <l4162656c69616e4d6f6e6f6964>`\

.. index::
   pair: FiniteFieldNormalBasis; getMultiplicationMatrix

:spadfun:`getMultiplicationMatrix`\: () -> \ :ref:`Matrix <l4d6174726978>`\  \ :ref:`PrimeField <l5072696d654669656c64>`\  p 
  \ ``getMultiplicationMatrix()``\  returns the multiplication table in form of a matrix.

.. _l46696e6974654669656c644e6f726d616c4261736973-6765744d756c7469706c69636174696f6e5461626c65:

.. index::
   pair: FiniteFieldNormalBasis; getMultiplicationTable

:spadfun:`getMultiplicationTable`\: () -> \ :ref:`Vector <l566563746f72>`\  \ :ref:`List <l4c697374>`\  Record(value: \ :ref:`PrimeField <l5072696d654669656c64>`\  p, index: \ :ref:`SingleInteger <l53696e676c65496e7465676572>`\ ) 
  \ ``getMultiplicationTable()``\  returns the multiplication table for the normal basis of the field. This table is used to perform multiplications between field elements.

.. _l46696e6974654669656c644e6f726d616c4261736973-73697a654d756c7469706c69636174696f6e:

.. index::
   pair: FiniteFieldNormalBasis; sizeMultiplication

:spadfun:`sizeMultiplication`\: () -> \ :ref:`NonNegativeInteger <l4e6f6e4e65676174697665496e7465676572>`\  
  \ ``sizeMultiplication()``\  returns the number of entries in the multiplication table of the field. Note: The time of multiplication of field elements depends on this size.
